OUTLINE : This prospective study . Participants undergo blood , tissue , saliva collection biological study . Samples analyze albumin-bound non-albumin-bound protein IgG via liquid chromatography tandem mass spectrometry ( LC-MS-MS ) , ELISA , proteomic profiling , protein expression .
